doc.title: Specialist Sales
doc.source_uri: 2025-08-29/JPM EMEA Spec Sits Daily ALPHA GA GXI GY DHER GY CEO call at 3pm UKTJPM EMEA Spec Sits Daily ALPHA GA GXI GY DHER GY CEO_2025-08-29

passages.text: - News/press: UCG IM raises stake in ALPHA GA to \(\sim 26\%\) , GXI GY CFO change and CMD postponed, WHR LN day 49 acceptance update
- Research: DHER GY reassuring conf call, JDEP NA slides used in deep-dive call, Iliad Q2 commentary on consolidation, cap goods electrical note (neutral on ABB)

- 15 min catch up with Ajay on TIT IM today? TIT IM shares closed down \(9\%\) yesterday following Iliad's CEO saying they've had no discussions with TIT since the beginning of April. Please reach out if you would like a 15 minute zoom catch-up with our analyst Ajay Soni - he has availability between 12-2pm UKT today.
- Today: WG/LN PUSU deadline
- JPM Today: DHER GY CEO call at 3pm / 10am ET. Our analyst Marcus is hosting a call with Niklas Östberg, CEO and Co-founder of Delivery Hero this afternoon. Sign-up here
- WHR LN: Day 49 acceptance update - BidCo may count \(\sim 35.59\%\) shares towards satisfaction of the Acceptance Condition. link

- ALPHA GA: UniCredit has entered into additional financial instruments relating to a \(\sim 5\%\) stake in Alpha Bank. This increases UniCredit's aggregate position to \(\sim 26\%\) . Conversion in physical shares of the stake exceeding \(9.9\%\) may only occur after regulatory approvals. link

- GXI GY: Gerresheimer has appointed Wolf Lehmann as CFO, effective on 1 September. Wolf Lehmann was most recently Operating Partner at private equity firm Triton. He was CFO at BEFESA, which is a Triton portfolio company and oversaw the company's IPO. The current CFO Dr. Bernd Metzner, who is leaving Gerresheimer at his own request. Gerresheimer will postpone the CMD, originally planned for October 15, 2025, to a later date.

- Deliver \(\theta\) - A solid enough conference call, in our view. We continue to see strategic value for Prosus at these levels and reiterate our OW rating - Marcus Diebel here Management hosted, in our view, a reassuring conference call. As highlighted earlier, we continue to believe in our "JustiFoodHero" theme (note here) and view Delivery Hero as still providing a high degree of strategic value for Prosus, with the announced sell-down potentially reassessed once the Just Eat transaction closes in early October.

- JDEP NA: Detailed slide deck used by our analyst Celine Pannuti in her JDEP NA deep-dive call yesterday. slides The slides provide an overview of the coffee market, JDE Peets' divisions, history since IPO and sector valuation.
- European Capital Goods - Near-term matters in the multi-year electricals trade- Phil Buller here
- French Telecoms - Iliad Q2: French growth slows more than peers. Record margins (op leverage + BTS). Italy M&A commentary- Akhil Dattani here

Consolidation: Iliad's CEO at a press conference is quoted as saying "we didn't have any discussions with Telecom Italia since the beginning of April, and these will not come back ... these perspectives are now behind us". This has seen Telecom Italia's shares \(- 8\%\) today. Investors will look to Iliad's earnings call to provide more colour on the French Telco competitive environment, as well as the evolving dialogue around a potential SFR "break- up", including whether this week's political developments might in any way complicate an M&A process.

- ECB accounts: "Deliberately uninformative"- Greg Fuzesi here- Oil Markets Weekly - Tariffs on India kick in—Russian oil flows likely to continue at limited discounts- Natasha Kaneva here- US: 2Q GDP revised up, profit margins hold despite tariffs- Abiel Reinhart here- US: A touch of relief from jobless claims- Abiel Reinhart here

- 26 August:- 27 August: MCG SJ vote, SAB SM ex-dvd, SXS LN vote, UBXN SW offer prospectus expected- 28 August: DHER GY H1 and 1pm call, SWON SW H1- 29 August: DHER GY CEO call at 3pm, WG/LN PUSU deadline

- UK Competitive M&A: Auction Process and Nine Examples here- EMEA Deal Survey - Arb Spreads as of August 7, 2025 here- UK Competitive M&A: Rule when one/more offers is being implemented via a Scheme here- Shell/BP - Investor feedback on M&A speculation (note from energy spec sales) here- Prosus/Tencent: Downside derives idea into Prosus CMD on June 25here- Holcim/Amrize Spin: Day 1 thoughts from industrials & special sits here- EMEA Potential M&A List - Updated as of June 17, 2025 here- Swedish Tender Offers where the 90% acceptance condition was lowered/waived here- Anglo/Valterra Spin-Off: Analysing historical spins including Thungela here- Anglo/Valterra Spin-Off: Estimating the flowback here- Shell/BP - M&A analysis sets a high bar for a deal (note from energy spec sales) here- Anglo American/Amplats Spin-Off: Estimating the flowback here- EMEA Deal Survey - Arb Spreads as of May 16, 2025 here- Gergheimer: KKR/Warburg opening Salvo too cheap (note from healthcare spec sales) here- Gfresheimer: Expect event-driven interest to increase post earnings tomorrow. here- TK WY NA/PRX NA - Investor Feedback. here- BAMI/UCG potential offer price changes here- M&A Outlook in 2025 - here
- 16 July - BMPS IM - London- 18-27 Jun: European Internet Trip - Berlin & London
- 3-Sep: European Leveraged Finance Fenn, London- 16-Sep: U.S. All Stars Conference - London- 12-Nov: Global Luxury and Brands Conference - Paris- 18-Nov: UK Leaders Conference, London
